testsuite.name: CinemaTests

testcase.name: start

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Wrong answer in test #1
Your menu should contain 4 items: 1. Show the seats 2. Buy a ticket 3. Statistics 0. Exit
Please find below the output of your program during this failed test. Note that the '>' character indicates the beginning of the input line.
---
Enter the number of rows: > 7 Enter the number of seats in each row: > 8 1. Show the seats 2. Buy a ticket 0. Exit
